H0.text: The term 'the fourth wall' would be used for an imaginary wall in what type of building. Concert Hall

H1.text: The term 'the fourth wall' would be used for an imaginary wall in what type of building. Museum

H2.text: The term 'the fourth wall' would be used for an imaginary wall in what type of building. Gallery

H3.text: The term 'the fourth wall' would be used for an imaginary wall in what type of building. Theatre

A4.text: The fourth wall is a performance convention in which an invisible, imaginary wall separates the actors from the audience.

A5.text: The metaphor relates to the mise‑en‑scène behind a proscenium arch.
